description: This file defines API routes for managing recipes, including listing, creating, retrieving, updating, deleting, and rating recipes. It uses FastAPI for routing and SQLAlchemy for database interactions.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router instance configured for recipe endpoints

classes.name: Recipe
classes.description: SQLAlchemy ORM model representing a recipe in the database

classes.name: RecipeRating
classes.description: ORM model representing user ratings for recipes

classes.name: User
classes.description: ORM model representing a user in the system

methods.name: _apply_filters( query, search: Optional[str], tags: Optional[List[str]], cuisine: Optional[str], difficulty: Optional[str], min_time: Optional[int], max_time: Optional[int], )
methods.description: Helper function to apply search and filter parameters to the recipe query

methods.name: list_recipes( search: Optional[str] = None, tags: Optional[List[str]] = Query(default=None), cuisine: Optional[str] = None, difficulty: Optional[str] = None, min_time: Optional[int] = None, max_time: Optional[int] = None, sort: Optional[str] = "newest", page: Optional[int] = 1, page_size: Optional[int] = 20, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a list of recipes with optional filtering, sorting, and pagination

methods.name: create_recipe( recipe: RecipeCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new recipe associated with the current user

methods.name: get_recipe(recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve detailed information of a recipe by its ID

methods.name: update_recipe( recipe_id: int, data: RecipeUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to update an existing recipe; only the owner can update

methods.name: delete_recipe( recipe_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a recipe; only the owner can delete

methods.name: rate_recipe( recipe_id: int, rating: RatingCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Endpoint to create or update a rating for a recipe by the current user
